articles.author: Vineet Washington
articles.title: Realme GT Explorer Master Edition New Suitcase Orange Colour May Launch in India; Master Edition European... - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Realme GT Explorer Master Edition may launch in India with a new colour variant — Suitcase Orange. Company CEO Madhav Sheth confirmed that the Realme GT and a Realme GT Master Edition phone will launch in India on August 18.
articles.content: Realme GT Explorer Master Edition may launch in India with a new colour variant Suitcase Orange. Realme CEO Madhav Sheth confirmed that the Realme GT and a Realme GT Master Edition phone will launch … [+2011 chars]

articles.author: Pushkala Aripaka
articles.title: No link found so far between menstrual disorders and COVID-19 vaccines, EU says - Reuters
articles.description: No causal link between COVID-19 vaccines and menstrual disorders has been found so far, Europe's drugs regulator said on Friday, separately recommending that three new conditions be added as possible side-effects of J&J's coronavirus shot.

articles.title: European Space Agency prepares for back-to-back flybys of Venus - The Guardian
articles.description: Missions with Nasa and Jaxa will use planet’s pull to lose energy, allowing spacecraft to fall closer to sun
articles.content:
